Minecraft
Minecraft is a 2011 sandbox game developed and published by Swedish video game developer Mojang Studios. Originally created by Markus "Notch" Persson using the Java programming language, the first public alpha build was released on 17 May 2009.

Zelda: TOTK
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a 2023 action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo. As the sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, it features an open world with new abilities and expanded vertical exploration.

Cyberpunk 2077
Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing video game developed by CD Projekt Red and released in 2020. Set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power and body modification, you play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant.

Rain World
Rain World is a survival platformer featuring a lone slugcat in a vast and punishing world. Released in 2017 and expanded in 2022, the game challenges players to survive in a ruined ecosystem filled with dangerous predators and mysterious ancient structures.

Red Dead Redemption 2
Red Dead Redemption 2 is a 2018 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. Set in 1899, it follows Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang as they struggle to survive in the dying days of the American Wild West while being hunted by government forces.

Hollow Knight
Hollow Knight is a 2017 Metroidvania action-adventure game developed by Team Cherry. Players explore the vast, interconnected world of Hallownest, encountering hostile creatures and friendly bugs while uncovering ancient secrets and mastering challenging combat.

God of War Ragnarök
God of War Ragnarök is an action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and released on November 9, 2022, for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. As a sequel to God of War (2018), it concludes Kratos and Atreus’ Norse saga, leading them through the prophecy of Ragnarök. The game introduces refined combat mechanics, allowing Kratos to wield the Leviathan Axe, Blades of Chaos, and a new Draupnir Spear, alongside expanded shield combat. Featuring Nine Realms to explore, the story involves battles against Thor, Odin, and other Norse gods. With emotional storytelling, epic set pieces, and improved AI, it received universal acclaim. Persona 5 Royal
Persona 5 Royal is an enhanced edition of Persona 5, developed by Atlus and released in 2019 (Japan) / 2020 (Worldwide) for PlayStation 4, later expanding to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox, and PC. It follows Joker and the Phantom Thieves of Hearts, who use supernatural powers to reform corrupt individuals by entering their Metaverse Palaces. The game adds new characters, including Kasumi Yoshizawa and Takuto Maruki, an extra third semester, and gameplay improvements like new areas, battle mechanics, and confidants. With enhanced visuals, music, and deeper storytelling, Persona 5 Royal received critical acclaim as one of the greatest JRPGs ever made.
